item.title: September --- Quote of the Month: -----------------“A bird doesn’t sing because it has an answer, it sings because it has a song. -- Maya Angelou -- Let your life be a song that encourages someone else.”
TV Box Maintenance: Be sure to close out of all of your apps when they are not in use. Once a month, Unplug the power to your modem for 2 minutes and plug back in to minimize buffering issues.
------ Feel free to call or text us the Business number (704) 705-7033 with any questions.-------
